sceneDescription: A brief description of everything going on in this scene.

nodes.description: A scene for testing different functions without messing up my main files.

paragraphs.text: This is the first message of the test scene.

responses.text: Yes, I agree. Let's go to Room 2. I think the story is in there somewhere.
No, I don't think so. I want to stay in this room.

nodes.description: You went to Room 2, whatever that is.

paragraphs.speaker: Big Steffe
paragraphs.text: Well, here we are. Room 2. There's...nothing here. You need to write more dialogue, Joseph.

paragraphs.speaker: null
paragraphs.text: A blocky, polygon-deprived Dark Elf entered the room, walking with a confident stride, yet clearly appearing as if he had shit his pants.

paragraphs.speaker: Jiub
paragraphs.text: Well, not even last night's storm could wake you. I heard them say we've reached Morrowind, I'm sure they'll let us go.

paragraphs.speaker: null
paragraphs.text: More paragraphs appeared on the page as if from thin air.

paragraphs.speaker: Big Steffe
paragraphs.text: Joseph...are you...seriously making dev tools right now?

paragraphs.speaker: null
paragraphs.text: He was. And he was getting good at it, too. So good, in fact, that he had barely kept up with his own speed of learning. Two long hours of analysis paralysis and two sleepless nights later, an entire suite of dev tool goodness had magically been laid out on his HTML document. In fact, even this very paragraph was written with the dev tools!

paragraphs.speaker: Testman
paragraphs.text: Hey! This is some test text!

responses.text: I'm trying, Steffe. Gimme a minute.

paragraphs.text: Big Steffe looks around, and shrugs.

paragraphs.speaker: Big Steffe
paragraphs.text: Whatever, maybe there's a story in this room, too? Assuming you're going to write it?

responses.text: Of course I am! I just need to figure out how to do it without messing up all my code. Be patient.

paragraphs.speaker: Testman
paragraphs.text: Hey! This is some test text! Again!
